function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Using ARIMA model for COVID-19 prediction and forecasting","Impact":"Inaccurate predictions may lead to ineffective public health measures and resource misallocation","Mitigation":"Validate ARIMA model accuracy with empirical data and expert review","Technologies":"Machine learning, data validation tools","People":"Public health officials, policy makers","Owner":"Data scientists, epidemiologists"},{"Description":"Quantifying SAR-CoV-2 infectiousness using contact tracing","Impact":"Misjudging infectiousness may result in improper control measures and increased transmission","Mitigation":"Combine contact tracing data with clinical observations for accurate quantification","Technologies":"Data analytics, contact tracing apps","People":"Infectious disease specialists, public health officials","Owner":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Cost analysis of WBE and clinical screening","Impact":"Inaccurate cost analysis may lead to misallocation of resources and budget overruns","Mitigation":"Incorporate local cost factors and consider long-term cost-effectiveness","Technologies":"Cost analysis software, geospatial mapping tools","People":"Public health planners, financial analysts","Owner":"Epidemiologists, public health authorities"}]}
